TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:May() filter:SetPlayer( EffectController() ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED, EffectController() )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if EffectDC() ~= nil then local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:GuidedReveal( ZONE_GRAVEYARD , ZONE_HAND ) target:PutInHand() end end
